short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Switches between arxiv PDF and ABS pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It is frustrating when the ArXiv preprint takes a lot of time to load, so you prefer to read the abstract itself. This means you have to edit the link manually, replacing the `pdf` and adding `abs` to the link. Not anymore! 

Introducing ArXiv Switch!
It lets you move from the PDF to abstract and back with just a click! Bonus: it now works with ACL Anthology as well!
Ctrl+Shift+S to do the same!
It's a simple chrome extension that you can install! And viola! One button to fill your life with bliss ðŸ•Š
